title: 求Bountiful Baubles mod汉化
author: 敏感词的锅
txt_content:

item.bountifulbaubles.ringGold.tooltip.0=§9Crafting component
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBalloon.name=Balloon
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBalloon.tooltip.0=§9Increases jump height and negates some fall damage.
item.bountifulbaubles.charmHermesWings.name=Hermes' Wings
item.bountifulbaubles.charmHermesWings.tooltip.0=§9Gives +20% speed
item.bountifulbaubles.charmHermesWings.tooltip.1=§dDeprecated, will probably be removed at some point maybe
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldCobalt.name=Cobalt Shield
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldCobalt.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to knockback when held or equipped in bauble slot.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldCobalt.tooltip.1=Also functions as a regular shield.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldCobalt.tooltip.2=Can be repaired in an anvil with iron ingots.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketObsidianSkull.name=Obsidian Skull
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketObsidianSkull.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to burning and 50% resistance to fire damage. (Does not protect against lava)
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketObsidianSkull.tooltip.1=§aHolding this makes you feel vaguely nervous.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldObsidian.name=Obsidian Shield
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldObsidian.tooltip.0=§9Grants partial fire resistance and immunity to knockback when held or equipped in bauble slot.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldObsidian.tooltip.1=Also functions as a regular shield.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldObsidian.tooltip.2=Can be repaired in an anvil with obsidian.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMagicLenses.name=Sunglasses
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMagicLenses.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to blindness.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMagicLenses.tooltip.1=§aCool guys don't look at explosions.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketApple.name=Forbidden Fruit
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketApple.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to hunger status effect, and nausea.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketVitamins.name=Vitamins
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketVitamins.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to weakness and mining fatigue.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringOverclocking.name=Ring of Overclocking
item.bountifulbaubles.ringOverclocking.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to slowness and +7% move speed.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringOverclocking.tooltip.1=§aEveryone knows that blue LEDs make your PC run faster.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketShulkerHeart.name=Shulker Heart
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketShulkerHeart.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to levitation
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketShulkerHeart.tooltip.1=§aIt's squishy...
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFreeAction.name=Ring of Free Action
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFreeAction.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to slowness and levitation and allows free movement through cobwebs
item.bountifulbaubles.enderDragonScale.name=Ender Dragon Scale
item.bountifulbaubles.brokenBlackDragonScale.name=Cracked Black Dragon Scale
item.bountifulbaubles.brokenBlackDragonScale.tooltip.0=§aBlack dragon scales are said to protect against withering. Perhaps this broken one could be repaired?
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBlackDragonScale.name=Black Dragon Scale
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBlackDragonScale.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to withering.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBezoar.name=Bezoar
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBezoar.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to poison.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMixedDragonScale.name=Mixed Color Dragon Scale
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMixedDragonScale.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to poison and withering.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMixedDragonScale.tooltip.1=§aInteresting, the bezoar has fused with the scale and made it appear to be two different colors.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketAnkhCharm.name=Ankh Charm
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketAnkhCharm.tooltip.0=§9Grants immunity to most negative status effects.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldAnkh.name=Ankh Shield
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldAnkh.tooltip.0=§9Grants partial fire resistance and immunity to knockback and most negative status effects when held or equipped in bauble slot.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldAnkh.tooltip.1=Also functions as a regular shield.
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldAnkh.tooltip.2=Can be repaired in an anvil with obsidian.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheel.name=Flywheel Ring
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheel.tooltip.0=§9Stores RF and automatically charges items in inventory when worn.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheel.tooltip.1=§aSurely nothing bad could ever result from wearing a ring that spins dozens of times a second.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheelAdvanced.name=Advanced Flywheel Ring
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheelAdvanced.tooltip.0=§9Stores RF and automatically charges items in inventory when worn.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheelAdvanced.tooltip.1=§aSurely nothing bad could ever result from wearing an ender magic ring that spins dozens of times a second.
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.name=Magic Mirror
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.tooltip.0=§9Teleports you to your spawn point.
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.tooltip.1=§aIt may bend space at will, but it can't make ugly things beautiful, unfortunately for you.
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.wrongdim=You sense that you are too far from home to return.
item.bountifulbaubles.potionRecall.name=Recall Potion
item.bountifulbaubles.potionRecall.tooltip.0=§9Teleports you to your spawn point.
# not much point having this tooltip when there's no zing sound
#item.bountifulbaubles.potionRecall.tooltip.1=§aAaaaaaand ZING!
item.bountifulbaubles.wormholeMirror.name=Wormhole Mirror
item.bountifulbaubles.wormholeMirror.tooltip.0=§9Right click to teleport to your spawn point.
item.bountifulbaubles.wormholeMirror.tooltip.0=§9Right click while sneaking to teleport to another player.
item.bountifulbaubles.wormholeMirror.tooltip.1=§aYou can feel the void staring back at you.
item.bountifulbaubles.potionWormhole.name=Wormhole Potion
item.bountifulbaubles.potionWormhole.tooltip.0=§9Teleports you to other players.
item.bountifulbaubles.potionWormhole.tooltip.mp=§aDoes not, however, guarantee that where they are is safe.
item.bountifulbaubles.potionWormhole.tooltip.sp=§aYou suddenly feel very alone.
item.bountifulbaubles.potionWormhole.nootherplayers=No teleportation targets available.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketLuckyHorseshoe.name=Lucky Horseshoe
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketLuckyHorseshoe.tooltip.0=§9Negates fall damage.
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketLuckyHorseshoe.tooltip.1=§aWhy did the horse need this?

bountifulbaubles.effect.sinful=Sinful

item.bountifulbaubles.amuletSinGluttony.tooltip.1=§9Grants sinful buff (+damage, +armor) when you eat.

item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBrokenHeart.tooltip.2=§aHow did this happen?

前两天我正好汉化啊
这个汉化只是对应我自己的语言习惯，可能有些许与不适应

replies.author: 敏感词的锅
replies.txt_content:
九耀龙翔 发表于 2019-11-13 20:54
前两天我正好汉化啊
这个汉化只是对应我自己的语言习惯，可能有些许与不适应
 ...
额，版本是同一个吗？为什么汉化文件反而比英文文件小？（众所周知一个汉字=2字母，所以一般情况下汉化后的文件会大于源文件的）

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
敏感词的锅 发表于 2019-11-13 21:51
额，版本是同一个吗？为什么汉化文件反而比英文文件小？（众所周知一个汉字=2字母，所以一般情况下汉化后 ...
文件大小什么时候是查看汉化的标准了？不看实际情况张口就来啊
举个例子，speed五个字符，翻译“速度”四个字符
你这一看就知道是RLCraft整合包，我这两天有时间就在搞这包的mod汉化
